verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Immortal love, forever full, Forever flowing free, Forever shared, forever whole, A never ebbing sea!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Blow, winds of God, awake and blow The mists of earth away: Shine out, O light divine, and show How wide and far we stray.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
v5
v6
v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Through Him the first fond prayers are said Our lips of childhood frame, The last low whispers of our dead Are burdened with His name.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Lord and master of us all, Whate’er our name or sign, We own Thy sway, we hear Thy call, We test our lives by Thine.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
